title: Mom says this virus would kill her 3-year-old
description: Brittany Stineman worries her 3-year-old son, Nash, won't survive Covid-19 if he catches it. He has a rare form of spinal muscular atrophy, and she is fighting to protect him. Watch more human stories of the pandemic.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
